text: geubunkkeseo badaleul dusimae neo huiga geulohayeo sinseonhan saengseon-eul meog dolog hasyeossgo geulobuteo neohuiga geol chil jangsigpum-eul eoddolog hayeoss-eumyeo pa doleul ilgo ganeun baeleul neohuiga bo lini ineun neohuiga geubun-ui eunhyeleul gang-guhadolog ham-ila neohuineun gamsaha ge doelila
